methods.name: public Builder withAlpha(float alpha)
methods.comment:
* @param alpha The alpha value to apply to the surface.
             * @return this Builder

methods.name: public Builder withMatrix(Matrix matrix)
methods.comment:
* @param matrix The matrix to apply to the surface.
             * @return this Builder

methods.name: public Builder withWindowCrop(Rect windowCrop)
methods.comment:
* @param windowCrop The window crop to apply to the surface.
             * @return this Builder

methods.name: public Builder withLayer(int layer)
methods.comment:
* @param layer The layer to assign the surface.
             * @return this Builder

methods.name: public Builder withCornerRadius(float radius)
methods.comment:
* @param radius the Radius for rounded corners to apply to the surface.
             * @return this Builder

methods.name: public Builder withBackgroundBlur(int radius)
methods.comment:
* @param radius the Radius for blur to apply to the background surfaces.
             * @return this Builder

methods.name: public Builder withVisibility(boolean visible)
methods.comment:
* @param visible The visibility to apply to the surface.
             * @return this Builder

methods.name: public Builder withMergeTransaction(Transaction mergeTransaction)
methods.comment:
* @param mergeTransaction The transaction to apply to the surface. Note this is applied
             *                         first before all the other properties.
             * @return this Builder
